description: The pen might be mightier, but this sword does more immediate damage.
Why say hello up close when you can do it from afar? Requires arrows for proper salutations.
Doesn't say much, but gets to the point quickly.
No need for diplomacy when you carry this hefty hammer. Often ends disputes... permanently.
Protection isn't just about blocking swords. This shield also deflects rumors, half-truths, and the occasional nasty comment.
Keeps your head in the game, and enemy blades out of it. Also great for pondering life's mysteries in safety.
Provides the grip of a vise and the protection of a mini fortress. Perfect for high-fives and handling prickly situations.
With these boots, every step feels like walking on a cloud. Also perfect for kicking foes and stepping on sharp objects.
These were rumored to be stolen from the tombs of kings in Aescaphone.
Small adventurers' favorite.
A rock. Duh.
Your inner kid will feel like they have the strength and agility of an alien superhero. It's like a secret weapon hiding in their brief.

Darker than black???
It's an ability that allows the user to manipulate light around them, creating illusions to deceive their enemies or even just to amaze their friends.
This divine drink is said to have extraordinary healing and rejuvenating properties.

itemName: Lollipop with Saliva of a God
description: Whose God saliva is this?
When you're so fortunate, it's when lady luck smiles upon you.
A cloak use by the citizen or voyagers of Edelvain.
A cloth that can never be staied by blood
A legendary artifact cloaked in mystery and power. This ancient piece of fabric is said to shimmer with an ethereal glow, reflecting the strength and wisdom of its previous owners.
Enhances the grip of the wearer that any kind of weapons they wear will not drop in their hands.
Gives you a god-like speed using the power of steam.
A mysterious man who has been lost in the desert with nothing left of him. He made use of all the resources he could find to survive and made this cactus armor to protect himself from danger.
Its a cube which is a truly unique weapon, steeped in mystery and intrigue. It's not your ordinary piece of armament; it's a work of art, an enigma wrapped in the guise of a weapon.
It's designed to augment strength, speed, and resilience beyond normal human limits.
latin word for Armor
Backwards Angel Armor.
Backwards Devil Armor.
A powerful artifact it's not just a symbol of leadership or authority, but it also possesses special abilities that can be utilized in various situations.
The 7 colors of the rainbow are Red, orange, yellow, green, blue, indigo, and violet. But, when everything is mixed up the 8th color Black will devour all colors.
In Norse mythology, Jörmungandr also known as the Midgard Serpent or World Serpent.
It cannot be worn by anyone as it will cause a lot of pain to the wearer if its intention is not heroic. Only a true hero will allow this helm to give its most potential capabilities.
This shoulder armor protects you from any kind of elements and makes the wearer capable of using it on its own to provide strength, wisdom, and fortitude.

245 million years from the Mesozoic era made from the humungous dinosaur bones that cover the full body. The bones were honed into more durable than steel which any weapon that touches the armor can easily break.
Can only be found on the 7777th floor of the Tower of God's Trial. It gives a massive defense and health bestowed by the blessing of the Gods from the shield.
The dagger is imbued with nano-technology that allows it to adapt to various combat situations. Known for its intricate design and lethal efficiency.
This weapon harnesses the power of steam to enhance the saber's speed and cutting ability.
A formidable piece of weaponry, combining advanced technology with raw firepower.
They are designed as a pair of knuckle-dusters, but their capabilities go far beyond that of a traditional melee weapon.
It's a powerful photon cannon that uses concentrated energy that can destory a whole city. A truly terrifying weapon
Backwards Sniper. This allows the user to rewind short periods of time, providing an opportunity to correct a missed shot or avoid incoming attacks.
A matchless steam gun. This uses high-pressure steam to propel projectiles at high speeds, causing significant damage upon impact.
It translates to Field of the People or Field of Armies. A place where half of those who die in combat go upon their death. A ballistic catapult.
Its a bow of elegance and deadly precision. Inspired by ancient norse mythology, giving it an air of elegance and mystery.
In Norse mythology, Skuld is one of the three Norns, or goddesses of destiny, who are akin to the Greek Fates. A gigantic sword.
A legendary sword of a Danish King. It was said to be the sharpest sword in existence and carried with it a curse that could bring misfortune or death if not handled properly.
In Norse mythology, Angrboda is a giantess who dwells in the land of the giants, Jotunheim. A volcanic sword
The kukri is a type of machete and it is known for its distinct recurve design.
Its a cube which is a truly unique weapon, steeped in mystery and intrigue. It's not your ordinary piece of armament; it's a work of art, an enigma wrapped in the guise of a weapon.
a weapon of prehistoric origins, is truly a marvel to behold. This club, believed to be 66 million years old, carries the weight of history in its every grain.
A devastating javelin capable of obliterating anything in their path.
Backwards reverse. Its design mimics the sinuous movement of a serpent, making it not only visually striking but also highly effective in combat.
3 in 1 word Splash, Smash, and Slash. A gun-blade mace???
A spell blade of extraordinary power and beauty. This blade is not just a tool for physical combat, but also a conduit for magical energies.
The orb harnesses the raw power of the elements, drawing from the very fabric of the universe itself.
a scythe that commands respect and fear in equal measure. It embodies the duality of life and death, creation and destruction.
Hammer of the Unending, is a weapon of immense power and grandeur. It's not just a tool for destruction but also a symbol of unyielding strength and resilience.
A lightning katana. It's adorned with symbols and motifs associated with lightning and storms, further emphasizing its elemental nature.
Also known as the Serpent's Venom, This blade embodies the lethal grace of a venomous snake, striking swiftly and accurately when least expected.
